words.source: KJV (bowed down his head), ESV (bowed his head), NASB (bowed), NET (bowed low); Qal wayyiqtol from קוד, 'to bow'
KJV, ESV, NASB, NET; definite noun אִישׁ
KJV (worshipped), ESV (worshiped), NASB (bowed himself down), NET (prostrated himself); Hitpael wayyiqtol from שׁחה, 'to bow down'
KJV, ESV, NASB, NET; preposition לְ + divine name יהוה
